thread.title: GameTyrant Podcast - Space Exploration Games

author: Jake Smith
title: GameTyrant Podcast - Space Exploration Games
text:
by Jake Smith 
This week Drew, Bryam, and I discuss features we love from some of our favorite games centered around space exploration. Then we take all those metaphorical ingredients and cook them up into our own ultimate space-time gumbo. Oddly enough, it sounds a hell of a lot like what Star Citizen has been promising will come from their game! Jake Smith — I head up the GameTyrant side of things around here. I'm borderline obsessed with the Mortal Kombat series, and have a 150 page study of every part of the lore on my hard-drive. Also, RPGs and Anime are pretty cool you guys. Newest GameTyrant Posts
